FuncDef:
The access-limit command configures the maximum number of users who are allowed to access the LNS.
The undo access-limit command cancels the configuration.
By default, a maximum of 32768 users are allowed to access an LNS.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the maximum number of access users.
For the NE40E-X3:The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 131072.
For the NE40E-X8 and NE40E-X16:The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 262144.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command can be used to restrict the number of users that access the LNS.
Configuration Impact
If the set maximum number of users that access the LNS is reached, the additional access users will be denied.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
